diseases.remedy: Qur'an recitation, prayer, remembrance (zikr); honey as physical adjunct
diseases.method: Regular spiritual practice and recitation; optionally use honey as tonic (1–2 tbsp in water)
diseases.dose: Spiritual practice daily; honey 1 cup with 1–2 tbsp if used physically
diseases.timing: Daily regimen; honey in morning supportive
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — emphasis on Qur'an as remedy; honey entries
diseases.remedy_description: Quran recitation and remembrance are spiritual practices; combined with honey as a physical tonic, they form a holistic approach. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Quran

diseases.remedy: Spiritual discipline, piety, behavioral modification, dietary advice
diseases.method: Engage in remembrance, counsel, adjust diet and behavior; seek spiritual remedies
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — Section on Amativeness
diseases.remedy_description: Spiritual discipline and piety involve prayer, remembrance, and behavioral change; visual depictions often include religious texts and serene settings. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Quran
